name: Chapter 11: New Challenges
short_description: With the rogue faction neutralized, the team faces unforeseen technical issues with the ancient algorithms. They must innovate solutions quickly to stay on track.
people: Data, Geordi La Forge, Codarian coders
from_prev_chapter: Regaining control, the team faces new technical challenges and time constraints.
to_next_chapter: Innovative solutions are found, and the team applies these to the project, edging closer to success.
